duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with complex litigation cases in medical malpractice, products liability, premise liability, and construction defects.
Conduct legal research, case management, and trial preparation.
Prepare legal documents and assist in legal writing.
Interact with clients, opposing counsel, and judicial officers.
Assume significant responsibility in a wide range of litigation matters.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (JD) degree and bar admission
